content.prompt: Which of the following statements best describes the pattern seen in age structure diagram C?

choices.label: The county has very little difference between the number of individuals in younger age groups and in older age groups, indicating a declining population size.
There is an imbalance between males and females, with a ratio of 1.5 men to every woman in the population.
The county most likely has a total fertility rate of less than 2.0.
There are more women than men between the ages of 35â€“49 as a result of immigration of women into the county.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
